certificates.title: Introduction to Generative AI
certificates.description: Comprehensive course covering the fundamentals of generative AI, including how it works, different model types, and practical applications. Completed with verified certification.

certificates.title: Introduction to Python for Developers
certificates.description: Comprehensive Python programming course for beginners covering fundamental concepts from basic syntax to advanced data structures. Completed hands-on exercises with variables, data types, control structures, and loops.

certificates.title: Understanding Artificial Intelligence
certificates.description: Comprehensive non-technical course exploring fundamental AI concepts and applications. Covered machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, generative models, and AI implementation in organizations with hands-on activities.
